languages.text: "Анархия в звездной гавани приведет к тому, что почтенные машинные духи летательных аппаратов взволнуются и оглохнут к литаниям успокоения. Следует быть осторожным с шаттлом, который мы используем для эвакуации".

"The anarchy at the starport will distress the hallowed machine spirits of the voidcraft, rendering them deaf to all litanies of placation. The shuttle we use for the evacuation must be handled with caution."
languages.original_text: "Анархия в звездной гавани приведет к тому, что почтенные машинные духи летательных аппаратов взволнуются и оглохнут к литаниям успокоения. Следует быть осторожным с шаттлом, который мы используем для эвакуации".

traits.locale_text: "The anarchy on the starport will distress the hallowed machine spirits of the voidcraft, rendering them deaf to all litanies of placation. The shuttle we use for the evacuation must be handled with caution."

"The anarchy on the starport will distress the hallowed machine spirits of the voidcraft, rendering them deaf to all litanies of placation. The shuttle we use for the evacuation must be handled with caution."

languages.text: “星港中的无政府状态，会让虚空舰上神圣的机魂感到不安，它们会对所有安抚仪式充耳不闻。因此，我们用来疏散的穿梭机必须谨慎对待才行。”
languages.original_text: "The anarchy at the starport will distress the hallowed machine spirits of the voidcraft, rendering them deaf to all litanies of placation. The shuttle we use for the evacuation must be handled with caution."

traits.locale_text: “星港中的无政府状态，会让虚空舰上神圣的机魂感到不安，它们会对所有安抚仪式充耳不闻。因此，我们用来疏散的穿梭机必须谨慎对待才行。”

languages.text: «La anarquía en el puerto estelar afectará a los espíritus máquina sagrados de la nave del vacío, lo que los dejará sordos a las letanías de apaciguamiento. La lanzadera de evacuación debe manejarse con cuidado».
languages.original_text: "The anarchy at the starport will distress the hallowed machine spirits of the voidcraft, rendering them deaf to all litanies of placation. The shuttle we use for the evacuation must be handled with caution."

traits.locale_text: «La anarquía en el puerto estelar afectará a los espíritus máquina sagrados de la nave del vacío, lo que los dejará sordos a las letanías de apaciguamiento. La lanzadera de evacuación debe manejarse con cuidado».

languages.text: 「スターポートでの無秩序は、ヴォイドクラフトの機械精霊を苦しめており、あらゆる鎮静化の儀式にも耳を貸さなないようにしています。避難に用いるシャトルは、慎重に扱わねばなりません」
languages.original_text: "The anarchy at the starport will distress the hallowed machine spirits of the voidcraft, rendering them deaf to all litanies of placation. The shuttle we use for the evacuation must be handled with caution."

traits.locale_text: 「スターポートでの無秩序は、ヴォイドクラフトの機械精霊を苦しめており、あらゆる鎮静化の儀式にも耳を貸さなないようにしています。避難に用いるシャトルは、慎重に扱わねばなりません」

languages.text: "Die Anarchie im Sternhafen wird die heiligen Maschinengeister des Raumschiffs verstören und sie taub gegenüber allen Beschwichtigungslitaneien machen. Das Shuttle, mit dem wir evakuieren, muss vorsichtig behandelt werden."
languages.original_text: "The anarchy at the starport will distress the hallowed machine spirits of the voidcraft, rendering them deaf to all litanies of placation. The shuttle we use for the evacuation must be handled with caution."

traits.locale_text: "Die Anarchie im Sternhafen wird die heiligen Maschinengeister des Raumschiffs verstören und sie taub gegenüber allen Beschwichtigungslitaneien machen. Das Shuttle, mit dem wir evakuieren, muss vorsichtig behandelt werden."

languages.text: « L'anarchie qui règne à l'astroport perturbe sans doute les esprits de la machine du vaisseau. Ils resteront sourds à toute prière d'apaisement. Nous devrons manier notre navette d'évacuation avec prudence. »
languages.original_text: "The anarchy at the starport will distress the hallowed machine spirits of the voidcraft, rendering them deaf to all litanies of placation. The shuttle we use for the evacuation must be handled with caution."

traits.locale_text: « L'anarchie qui règne à l'astroport perturbe sans doute les esprits de la machine du vaisseau. Ils resteront sourds à toute prière d'apaisement. Nous devrons manier notre navette d'évacuation avec prudence. »

languages.text: "Yıldız limanında meydana gelen anarşi, uçsuz cihazlarının kutsal makine ruhlarına rahatsızlık verecek, onları teskin ilahilerine karşı sağırlaştıracaktır. Tahliye mekiğini kullanırken çok dikkatli olmalıyız."
languages.original_text: "The anarchy at the starport will distress the hallowed machine spirits of the voidcraft, rendering them deaf to all litanies of placation. The shuttle we use for the evacuation must be handled with caution."

traits.locale_text: "Yıldız limanında meydana gelen anarşi, uçsuz cihazlarının kutsal makine ruhlarına rahatsızlık verecek, onları teskin ilahilerine karşı sağırlaştıracaktır. Çıkış için kullandığımız mekik hususunda dikkatli olmalıyız."

languages.original_text: "The anarchy on the starport will distress the hallowed machine spirits of the voidcraft, rendering them deaf to all litanies of placation. The shuttle we use for the evacuation must be handled with caution."
